Settings: Shuffles both action ans support skills among jobs. Groups of spells will (mostly) be kept together, e.g. Fire/Fira/Firaga/Flare
Godspeed Strike late game only
Forces Godspeed Strike to be in the 15th slot of a job's skills.
Randomly shuffles cost types (i.e. MP, HP, BP, PG) among job skills. The actual costs are adjusted accordingly.
Shuffles stats among jobs.
Swap
E.g. the Freelancer could inherit all the stats of the White Mage.
Random
E.g. the Freelancer could inherit HP stats of the White Mage, MP stats of the Black Mage, ....
Shuffles weapon/shield affinities among jobs.
Swap
E.g. the Freelancer could inherit all affinities of the White Mage.
Random
E.g. the Freelancer could inherit the Sword affinity of the White Mage, Shield affinity of the Black Mage, ....
Shuffle items among chests, quests, enemy drops and enemy steals. Items dropped by enemies for quests will be kept on the same enemy.
